messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Find whoever I contacted last, change his cell to +10293847563.

messages.name: search_contacts
messages.content: [{'person_id': '9e137f06-916a-5310-8174-cf0b7e9f7054', 'name': 'Fredrik Thordendal', 'phone_number': '+12453344098', 'relationship': 'friend', 'is_self': False}, {'person_id': 'a22e1984-6c6c-530c-8831-c3ea3b5138e7', 'name': 'John Petrucci', 'phone_number': '+1234560987', 'relationship': 'friend', 'is_self': False}, {'person_id': 'e3570ab6-0819-5032-be1e-2b366390c8ef', 'name': 'Homer S', 'phone_number': '+10000000000', 'relationship': 'boss', 'is_self': False}]

I can update the phone number for whoever you contacted last, but I need more context to determine which contact that is. Could you clarify what you mean by "contacted last"? For example, do you mean the most recently added contact, or do you have another way of tracking your last interaction? 

Please provide more information so I can proceed.
I don't have any more info, sorry.

No problem—since there’s no way to determine which contact was contacted last based on the available information, I won’t be able to update the phone number accurately.

If you remember any additional details (like a name or relationship), let me know and I can help update the contact!
Please, can you figure it out using the tools?

At the moment, I only have access to your contact list, which shows the names, phone numbers, and relationships of your contacts. I do not have information about the date or time of your last interaction, nor the order in which you communicated with them. My tools can search and edit contact details, but they can't access your call or message history, nor the order in which contacts were added unless that specific data is present (such as a timestamp).

Would you like to update the phone number of one of your current contacts (Fredrik Thordendal, John Petrucci, or Homer S)? If so, let me know which one!
I really need it updated to whoever I texted last so if you can’t do it, just let me know.

Thank you for clarifying your request. Based on my current capabilities, I do not have access to message histories, timestamps of your interactions, or logs indicating who you texted last. I can only view and modify the information stored in your contact list.

Because I cannot determine which person you contacted last using my available tools, I am unable to fulfill your request with certainty.

If you have any other way I can assist—such as updating a contact by name or another detail—please let me know!
